p: Much can be learned from past infectious disease outbreaks to improve preparedness and response to future public health threats. Three key questions arise in light of the COVID-19 outbreak: To what extent were the previous human coronavirus (SARS and MERS) outbreaks studied? Is research on emerging viruses being sustained, aiming to understand and prevent future epidemics? Are there lessons from academic publications on previous emerging viruses that could be applied to the current COVID-19 epidemic?
